sentences.content: 1. The scale of offshore wind installation in the OSPAR Maritime Area is expected to increase
greatly in the next decade and beyond, primarily in the Greater North Sea and the Celtic Seas;
2. Knowledge on ecological impacts has grown over the last decade, but the evidence and data
are still uncertain, particularly in relation to cumulative effects of this major expansion. Major
